name: Loud Cloud the Storm Breather
text: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) if there is a WIND and FIRE monsters in your GY. You can banish this face-up card on the field; Draw 1 card, and if it is a Reptile monster, Special Summon it, otherwise send that card to the GY. You can only use this effect of "Loud Cloud the Storm Breather" once per turn.
